entry.title: Monday: Periods of snow or rain. High 8.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending this morning then cloudy with 40 percent chance of rain showers. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 this morning. High 8. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Monday 3 April 2023
